Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Military Industry[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+15 exp to all combat units.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] for combat units.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gatling Gun[ENDCOLOR].
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Counterspionage[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+50% catch spies in own cities and +50% rigging election in city-states.[NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] from Brandenburg Gate.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Industry 4[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] from Factory.[NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] from workshop.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cannon[ENDCOLOR].
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Civil Engineering[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Free Great Engineer.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] and +2 [ICON_FOOD] in each city.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Espionage[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+66% speed to steal tech from another civilization.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cavalry[ENDCOLOR].

Set.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Free Thought[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+17% [ICON_RESEARCH] from University and +5 [ICON_RESEARCH] from Laboratory.[NEWLINE]+33% [ICON_RESEARCH] from Angkor Wat.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Sovereignty[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_GOLD] from [ICON_RESEARCH] Science buildings.[NEWLINE]+33% [ICON_PRODUCTION] for [ICON_RESEARCH] Science buildings.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Scientific Revolution[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Free Great Scientist.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] from each city.[NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_RESEARCH] from Tower of Pisa.

Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Agriculture Revolution[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] from each farm and plantation.

Set.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Secularism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_RESEARCH] from every Specialist.[NEWLINE]+25% growth Great Scientist.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Musketman[ENDCOLOR].

Industry is a policy branch that focuses on the production.[NEWLINE]This branch refers to The Industrial Revolution that was was the transition to new manufacturing processes in the period from about 1760 onwards.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Industry[ENDCOLOR] focuses on the production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Industry, you receive +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] in the edification of production buildings and +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] from production buildings.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Industry, +50% of strategic resources and +33% internal trade yields.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Industry[ENDCOLOR] focuses on the production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Industry, you receive +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] in the edification of production buildings and +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] from production buildings.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Industry, +50% of strategic resources and +33% internal trade yields.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

Enlightenment is a policy branch that focuses on the science.[NEWLINE]This branch refers to the Age of Enlightenment that was an intellectual and philosophical movement that dominated the world of ideas in Europe during the 18th century.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Enlightenment[ENDCOLOR] focuses on the science, on the research.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Enlightenment, you receive +10% [ICON_RESEARCH] if you are happy and +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] from trading post.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Enlightenment, you can see the hidden archaeological sites, you receive +50% [ICON_RESEARCH] from research agreement and +5 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] from CN Tower.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Enlightenment[ENDCOLOR] focuses on the science, on the research.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Enlightenment, you receive +10% [ICON_RESEARCH] if you are happy and +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] from trading post.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Enlightenment, you can see the hidden archaeological sites, you receive +50% [ICON_RESEARCH] from research agreement and +5 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] from CN Tower.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Treasure Fleets[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_GOLD] from all your sea trade routes.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GOLD] from all trade routes with city-states.[NEWLINE]-10% maintenance of buildings.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Maritime Infrastructure[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] in coastal cities.[NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_CULTURE] and +4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] from National Treasury.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] from each lighthouse, harbor and seaport.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Frigate[ENDCOLOR].
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Protectionism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from each Luxury resource.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GOLD] from each Great Person Improvement.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Merchant Navy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_MOVES] to embarked unit.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_MOVES] and +1 sight for Naval unit.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_MOVES] for Great Admiral.[NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_GOLD] from Great Lighthouse.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Caravel[ENDCOLOR].
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Wagon Trains[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from all your land trade routes. Maintenance paid on Roads and Railroads reduced by 50%.[NEWLINE]Free Great Merchant.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Navigation school[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Free Great Admiral.[NEWLINE]The Great Admirals are generated 50% faster.[NEWLINE]+20% naval units [ICON_PRODUCTION] production.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Galleass[ENDCOLOR].

Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Local product export[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_GOLD] from each trading post, quarry, pasture and camp.

Set.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Entrepreneurship[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Great Merchants are earned 25% faster. Receive double [ICON_GOLD] Gold from Great Merchant trade missions.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GOLD] from each specialist.[NEWLINE]The [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Landsknecht[ENDCOLOR] can be built.

Communes is a policy branch that focuses on the commerce and on the maritime development.[NEWLINE]This branch refers to the Italian maritime republics (Genoa, Venice, Pisa, Amalfi), to the cities of the Hanseatic League and to the crossroads cities like Milan and Munich; The period of concern goes about from 1100 to 1700.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Communes[ENDCOLOR] focuses on the commerce and on the maritime development.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Communes, the Markets provides +15% [ICON_GOLD] and the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Landsknecht[ENDCOLOR] can be built.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Communes, you receive 5 units without maintenance (landsknecht, galleass, caravel, frigate and ironclad), the wonder Terracotta Army provides +8 [ICON_CULTURE] Petra +2 [ICON_CULTURE] and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ironclad[ENDCOLOR] can be built.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Communes[ENDCOLOR] focuses on the commerce and on the maritime development.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Communes, the Markets provides +15% [ICON_GOLD] and the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Landsknecht[ENDCOLOR] can be built.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Communes, you receive 5 units without maintenance (landsknecht, galleass, caravel, frigate and ironclad), the wonder Terracotta Army provides +8 [ICON_CULTURE] Petra +2 [ICON_CULTURE] and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ironclad[ENDCOLOR] can be built.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Flourishing of Arts[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+33% [ICON_CULTURE] in city if there is at least one wonder in city.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_CULTURE] from each wonder.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cultural Exchange[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Increases the tourism modifier for shared religion, trade routes, and open borders by 15% each.[NEWLINE]A free Great Writer.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cultural Centers[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] when you build a cultural building.[NEWLINE]+10% growth of Great People.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Artistic genius[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Free Great Artist and free Great Musician.

Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Enhancement[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_CULTURE] from each Great Person Improvement.[NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_TOURISM] from hotel.[NEWLINE]+6 [ICON_CULTURE] from Colossus.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Humanism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_CULTURE] from Great Works.[NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_TOURISM] from museum and Louvre.[NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_TOURISM] from Broadway, Sistine Chapel and Great Library.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Trebuchet[ENDCOLOR].

Set.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fine Arts[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]66% of excess [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness added each turn to the amount of [ICON_CULTURE] Culture that may be spent on Social Policies.
Patronage is a policy branch that focuses on the patronage of great people and on the culture.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Patronage[ENDCOLOR] focuses on great people and on culture.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Patronage, great humanist person is born +25% faster and 150 [ICON_TOURISM] when a great person is born.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Patronage provides a golden age, double theming bonus and 34% of excess [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] added each turn to the amount of [ICON_CULTURE].[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Patronage[ENDCOLOR] focuses on great people and on culture.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Patronage, great humanist person is born +25% faster and 150 [ICON_TOURISM] when a great person is born.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Patronage provides a golden age, double theming bonus and 34% of excess [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] added each turn to the amount of [ICON_CULTURE].[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Citizenship[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Tile improvement construction rate increased by 25% and a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Worker[ENDCOLOR] appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]cargo ship[ENDCOLOR].

Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Holy war[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]During the following thirty turns you have a combat bonus for all combat unit.[NEWLINE]-10% [ICON_PEACE] in the costs of the faith.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]knight[ENDCOLOR].
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Holy city[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_GOLD] and +1 [ICON_PEACE] each 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] of holy city.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_FOOD] in holy city and +3 [ICON_CULTURE] from holy site.

Set.Text: Organized religion
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Organized religion[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_PEACE] from shrine, +2 [ICON_PEACE] from temple.[NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_PEACE] and +25% [ICON_TOURISM] from Grand Temple.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Theocracy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_GOLD] from temple.[NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_GOLD] from Holy Site.[NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_GOLD] from Grand Temple.[NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_PEACE] from Notre Dame.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]pikeman[ENDCOLOR].
Feudalism is a policy branch that focuses on religion and on capital.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Feudalism[ENDCOLOR] focuses on religion and on capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Feudalism provides +100% [ICON_PRODUCTION] when you build religious buildings, 150 [ICON_TOURISM] when a prophet is born and 30 [ICON_TOURISM] when a missionary or a inquisitor is born.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the wonder [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mosque of Djenné[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Feudalism provides a free prophet, +3 [ICON_CULTURE] from holy site and the wonder Borobudur and Stonehenge provide +6 [ICON_CULTURE].[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Feudalism[ENDCOLOR] focuses on religion and on capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Feudalism provides +100% [ICON_PRODUCTION] when you build religious buildings, 150 [ICON_TOURISM] when a prophet is born and 30 [ICON_TOURISM] when a missionary or a inquisitor is born.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the wonder [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mosque of Djenné[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Feudalism provides a free prophet, +3 [ICON_CULTURE] from holy site and the wonder Borobudur and Stonehenge provide +6 [ICON_CULTURE].[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Discipline[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]-33% [ICON_GOLD] unit upgrade.[NEWLINE]+50% exp from each battle.[NEWLINE]Each unit receives discipline promotion.
Cultural diplomacy

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cultural diplomacy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]The amount of resources donated by city-states increases by 100%.[NEWLINE]Happiness [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] from donated luxury resources increases by 50%.[NEWLINE]Unhappiness [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] from the number of [ICON_CITIZEN] and city number decreased by 5%.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Philanthropy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Gold [ICON_GOLD] donations to city-state produce +25% [ICON_INFLUENCE] and [ICON_INFLUENCE] of city-state decreases 25% slower.

Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Colonization[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Free [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]settler[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE]+33% settler production [ICON_PRODUCTION].[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CITIZEN] in new founded cities.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Embellishment[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]-10% [ICON_GOLD] building maintenance.[NEWLINE]+10% wonder production [ICON_PRODUCTION].[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] from each wonder.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Empire unity[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]-33% [ICON_CULTURE] cost policies due to number cities and golden age.

Set.Text: BARBARIAN INVASIONS
Barbarian Invasions
Barbarian Invasions is a policy branch that focuses on defense and barbarian integration.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Barbarian Invasions[ENDCOLOR] focuses on defense and barbarian integration.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Invasions provides [ICON_CULTURE] each barbarian kill and bonus of +50% against barbarian unit.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Invasions provides 100% [ICON_GOLD] from each kill.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Barbarian Invasions[ENDCOLOR] focuses on defense and barbarian integration.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Invasions provides [ICON_CULTURE] each barbarian kill and bonus of +50% against barbarian unit.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Invasions provides 100% [ICON_GOLD] from each kill.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.
Centralization of the capital city
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Centralization[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] and +25% [ICON_TOURISM] from palace and -1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] each 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] of the capital.
Absolutism of the crown

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Absolutism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] each [ICON_CONNECTED] with capital and free promotion Absolutism to land unit.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]swordsman[ENDCOLOR].

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Oligarchy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Garrisoned units cost no maintenance and cities with a garrison gain +50% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] Ranged Combat Strength.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]catapult[ENDCOLOR].
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Luxury[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides +10% wonder [ICON_PRODUCTION] and +1 [ICON_GOLD] each 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] of the capital city.
Monarchy is a form of government focused on the king and therefore on the capital and on the defense of its territory.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Monarchy[ENDCOLOR] lends itself well to a civilization that focuses on the capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Monarchy provides +3 [ICON_CULTURE] in capital city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Monarchy will built 4 aqueduct and +2 [ICON_FOOD] from aqueduct.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Monarchy[ENDCOLOR] lends itself well to a civilization that focuses on the capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Monarchy provides +3 [ICON_CULTURE] in capital city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Monarchy will built 4 aqueduct and +2 [ICON_FOOD] from aqueduct.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.
Focus on growth
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Growth[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] and +1 [ICON_FOOD] from Granary.
Elliniki eirini
Hellenic peace
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Elliniki eirini[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_FOOD] from Amphitheater and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] in each city.

Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Legalism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Provides a free cultural building in all cities.

Set.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Meritocracy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]-5% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] from [ICON_CITIZEN] in the not occupied cities and +5% [ICON_PRODUCTION] for the buildings.

Democracy was born in Greece. It is a form of government where the power belongs to the people; for this reason, the branch democracy is focused on the culture of civilization but also on the growth and happiness of civilization.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Democracy[ENDCOLOR] lends itself well to a civilization that focuses on culture and expansion.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Democracy provides +1 [ICON_CULTURE] and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] in each city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Democracy will bring up a Great Person of your choice.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Democracy[ENDCOLOR] lends itself well to a civilization that focuses on culture and expansion.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Democracy provides +1 [ICON_CULTURE] and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] in each city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Democracy will bring up a Great Person of your choice.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

Row.Text: +10% in your territory.[NEWLINE]+18% near capital; the bonus decreases moving away from the capital.

Set.Text: Anti pillage

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Anti-pillage[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] if unit is in the city.[NEWLINE]+10% defense of the city.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_FOOD] from the fort improvement.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]barbarian axman[ENDCOLOR].

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Warrior code[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]-15% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] from [ICON_CITIZEN] of occupied cities.[NEWLINE]+50% growth Great General.[NEWLINE]Free Great General.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]trireme[ENDCOLOR].
Military training
Military training

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Military training[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+15 exp to all trained units.[NEWLINE]+50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] for military building.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_CULTURE] if a unit is in city.[NEWLINE]You see barbarian camp.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Integration[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_FOOD] and +1 [ICON_FOOD] from Colosseum.[NEWLINE]-5% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] from [ICON_CITIZEN].[NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_PEACE] from Statue of Zeus.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Military tradition[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]-15% unit maintenance.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] for all units.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]composite bowman[ENDCOLOR].

Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Panem et Circenses[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] for [ICON_FOOD] food and [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] happiness buildings.

Set.Text: In history, Roman empire is the most famous empire. Empire is a form of government where only one has power and the territory covers more countries; for this reason, the branch empire is focused on the growth and expansion of the civilization.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Empire[ENDCOLOR] lends itself well to a civilization that focuses on expansion.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]horseman[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Empire provides -25% [ICON_CULTURE] to take the new tiles, -10% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] from the number of cities and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] from fort improvement.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Empire, sometimes the allied city-state will donate you a Great Person.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Empire[ENDCOLOR] lends itself well to a civilization that focuses on expansion.[NEWLINE]This policy unlocks the unit [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]horseman[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Empire provides -25% [ICON_CULTURE] to take the new tiles, -10% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] from the number of cities and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] from fort improvement.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all the politics of Empire, sometimes the allied city-state will donate you a Great Person.[NEWLINE]Also, by concluding the branch, you will receive a free policy.

Row.Text: This wonder can only be built with the acquisition of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Organized Religion[ENDCOLOR] policy.[NEWLINE]All Missionaries born in this city can spread religion one more time. Provides a free Mosque in the city in which it is built.

A trench is a type of excavation or depression in the ground that is generally deeper than it is wide, and narrow compared with its length.[NEWLINE]Trenches have often been dug for military purposes. Trench warfare and tactics evolved further in World War I. Trench warfare occurred when a revolution in firepower was not matched by similar advances in mobility, resulting in a grueling form of warfare in which the defender held the advantage.

The [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Trench[ENDCOLOR] is an improvement that does not improve any resources but the allocated units receive [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+50% defense[ENDCOLOR] and all units that are near the Trench receive a [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]-10 damage[ENDCOLOR] each turn if the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Trench[ENDCOLOR] is in your territory.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Industria Militare[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+15 exp a tutte le unità militari.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] per le unità militari.[NEWLINE]Questa politica sblocca l'unità [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gatling Gun[ENDCOLOR].

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Controspionaggio[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+50% probabilità di prendere le spie nelle proprie città e +50% probabilità di pilotare l'elezione in una città stato.[NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] dalla Porta di Brandeburgo.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Industria 4[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] da Fabbrica.[NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] da Bottega.[NEWLINE]Questa politica sblocca l'unità [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cannone[ENDCOLOR].
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ingegneria Civile[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Grande Ingegnere gratis.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] e +2 [ICON_FOOD] in ogni città.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Spionaggio[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+66% velocità per rubare una tech a un'altra civiltà.[NEWLINE]Questa politica sblocca l'unità [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cavalleria[ENDCOLOR].

Set.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Libero Pensiero[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+17% [ICON_RESEARCH] da Università e +5 [ICON_RESEARCH] da Laboratorio.[NEWLINE]+33% [ICON_RESEARCH] da Angkor Wat.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Sovranità[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_GOLD] da [ICON_RESEARCH] edifici scientifici.[NEWLINE]+33% [ICON_PRODUCTION] per [ICON_RESEARCH] edifici scientifici.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rivoluzione Scientifica[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Grande Scienziato gratis.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] e +1 [ICON_CULTURE] in ogni città.[NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_RESEARCH] dalla Torre di Pisa.

Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rivoluzione Agricola[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] da ogni fattoria e piantagione.

Set.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Secolarismo[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_RESEARCH] da ogni specialista.[NEWLINE]+25% crescita Grandi Scienziati.[NEWLINE]Questa politica sblocca l'unità [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Soldato con Moschetto[ENDCOLOR].

Industria è un policy branch che si focalizza sulla produzione.[NEWLINE]Questo branch si riferisce alla Rivoluzione Industriale che è stata la transizione al nuovo processo di produzione nel periodo da circa 1760 in poi.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Industria[ENDCOLOR] è focalizzata sulla produzione.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottando Industria, ricevi +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] nella costruzione degli edifici di produzione e +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] dagli edifici di produzione.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare tutte le politiche di Industria fornisce +50% di risorse strategiche e +33% resa dalle rotte commerciali interne.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Industria[ENDCOLOR] è focalizzata sulla produzione.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottando Industria, ricevi +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] nella costruzione degli edifici di produzione e +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] dagli edifici di produzione.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare tutte le politiche di Industria fornisce +50% di risorse strategiche e +33% resa dalle rotte commerciali interne.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

Illuminismo è un policy branch che si focalizza sulla scienza.[NEWLINE]Questo branch si riferisce all'Età dell'Illuminismo che era un movimento intellettuale e filosofico che era prevalente in Europa durante il 1700.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Illuminismo[ENDCOLOR] è focalizzato sulla scienza, sulla ricerca.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottando Illuminismo, ricevi +10% [ICON_RESEARCH] se la civiltà è felice e +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] da Base commerciale.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottando tutte le politiche di Illuminismo, potrai vedere i siti archeologici nascosti, riceverai +50% [ICON_RESEARCH] dagli accordi di ricerca e +5 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] da CN Tower.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Illuminismo[ENDCOLOR] è focalizzato sulla scienza, sulla ricerca.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottando Illuminismo, ricevi +10% [ICON_RESEARCH] se la civiltà è felice e +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] da Base commerciale.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottando tutte le politiche di Illuminismo, potrai vedere i siti archeologici nascosti, riceverai +50% [ICON_RESEARCH] dagli accordi di ricerca e +5 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] da CN Tower.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Infrastrutture marittime[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] nelle città costiere.[NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_CULTURE] e +4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] da Tesoreria Nazionale.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] da ogni faro, porto e cantiere navale.[NEWLINE]Questa politica sblocca [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fregata[ENDCOLOR].
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Protezionismo[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] da ogni risorsa di lusso.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GOLD] da ogni miglioramento di Grandi Personaggi.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Flotta mercantile[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_MOVES] alle truppe imbarcate.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_MOVES] e +1 raggio visivo alle unità navali.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_MOVES] ai Grandi Ammiragli.[NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_GOLD] da Grande Faro.[NEWLINE]Questa politica sblocca [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Caravella[ENDCOLOR].
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Carovane[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GOLD] dalle Rotte commerciali terrestri. Il mantenimento delle strade e delle ferrovie è ridotto del 50%.[NEWLINE]Grande Mercante gratis.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Scuola di navigazione[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Grande Ammiraglio gratis.[NEWLINE]I Grandi Ammiragli sono generati il 50% più velocemente.[NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] produzione unità navali.[NEWLINE]Questa politica sblocca [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Galeazza[ENDCOLOR].

Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Esportazione prodotti locali[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_GOLD] da ogni trading post, cava, pascolo e campo.

Set.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Imprenditorialità[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]I Grandi Mercanti nascono il 25% più velocemente. Ricevi una quantità doppia di [ICON_GOLD] dalle missioni commerciali dei Grandi Mercanti.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GOLD] da ogni specialista.

Comuni è un branch che è focalizzato sul commercio e sullo sviluppo marittimo.[NEWLINE]Questo branch si riferisce alle Repubbliche Marinare (Genova, Venezia, Pisa, Amalfi), alle città della Lega Anseatica e alle città crocevia come Milano e Monaco di Baviera; Il periodo concernente va dal 1100 al 1700 circa.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Comuni[ENDCOLOR] si focalizza sul commercio e sullo sviluppo marittimo.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottando Comuni, i Mercati forniscono +15% [ICON_GOLD] e l'unità [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Lanzichenecchi[ENDCOLOR] può essere costruita.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare tutte le politiche di Comuni, ricevi 5 unità senza manutenzione (lanzichenecco, galeazza, caravella, fregata e ironclad), la meraviglia Esercito di Terracotta fornisce +8 [ICON_CULTURE] Petra +2 [ICON_CULTURE] e l'unità [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ironclad[ENDCOLOR] può essere costruita.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Comuni[ENDCOLOR] si focalizza sul commercio e sullo sviluppo marittimo.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottando Comuni, i Mercati forniscono +15% [ICON_GOLD] e l'unità [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Lanzichenecchi[ENDCOLOR] può essere costruita.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare tutte le politiche di Comuni, ricevi 5 unità senza manutenzione (lanzichenecco, galeazza, caravella, fregata e ironclad), la meraviglia Esercito di Terracotta fornisce +8 [ICON_CULTURE] Petra +2 [ICON_CULTURE] e l'unità [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ironclad[ENDCOLOR] può essere costruita.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

Mecenatismo è un branch che si focalizza sul mecenatismo dei grandi personaggi e sulla cultura.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mecenatismo[ENDCOLOR] è focalizzato sui grandi personaggi e sulla cultura.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottando Mecenatismo, i grandi umanisti nascono il 25% più velocemente e 150 [ICON_TOURISM] quando nasce un grande personaggio.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare tutte le politiche di Mecenatismo duplica il bonus a tema comune e il 34% dell'eccesso di [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] è aggiunto alla [ICON_CULTURE].[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Feudalesimo[ENDCOLOR] è focalizzato sulla religione e sulla capitale.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare Feudalesimo fornisce +100% [ICON_PRODUCTION] quando costruisci edifici religiosi, 150 [ICON_TOURISM] quando nasce un profeta e 30 [ICON_TOURISM] quando nasce un missionario o un inquisitore.[NEWLINE]Questa politica sblocca la meraviglia [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Moschea di Djenné[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottando tutte le politiche del Feudalesimo nascerà un profeta in capitale, +3 [ICON_CULTURE] da holy site e le meraviglie Borobudur e Stonehenge forniscono +6 [ICON_CULTURE].[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Feudalesimo[ENDCOLOR] è focalizzato sulla religione e sulla capitale.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare Feudalesimo fornisce +100% [ICON_PRODUCTION] quando costruisci edifici religiosi, 150 [ICON_TOURISM] quando nasce un profeta e 30 [ICON_TOURISM] quando nasce un missionario o un inquisitore.[NEWLINE]Questa politica sblocca la meraviglia [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Moschea di Djenné[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottando tutte le politiche del Feudalesimo nascerà un profeta in capitale, +3 [ICON_CULTURE] da holy site e le meraviglie Borobudur e Stonehenge forniscono +6 [ICON_CULTURE].[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

Nella storia, l'Impero Romano è il più famoso. L'impero è una forma di governo dove il potere è di uno solo e il territorio comprende più nazioni; per questa ragione, il branch impero è focalizzato sulla crescita e sull'espansione della civiltà.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Impero[ENDCOLOR] è un policy branch focalizzato sull'espansione.[NEWLINE]Questa politica sblocca l'unità [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]guerriero a cavallo[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare Impero fornisce -25% [ICON_CULTURE] per prendere nuovi esagoni, -10% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] dal numero delle città e +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] dai forti.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare tutte le politiche dell'Impero fa si che le città-stato alleate ti doneranno occasionalmente un Grande Personaggio.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Impero[ENDCOLOR] è un policy branch focalizzato sull'espansione.[NEWLINE]Questa politica sblocca l'unità [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]guerriero a cavallo[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare Impero fornisce -25% [ICON_CULTURE] per prendere nuovi esagoni, -10% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] dal numero delle città e +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] dai forti.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare tutte le politiche dell'Impero fa si che le città-stato alleate ti doneranno occasionalmente un Grande Personaggio.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Disciplina[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]-33% [ICON_GOLD] upgrade delle unità.[NEWLINE]+50% exp in ogni combattimento.[NEWLINE]Ogni unità riceve la promozione disciplina.
Diplomazia culturale

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Diplomazia culturale[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]La quantità di risorse donate dalle città-stato aumenta del 100%.[NEWLINE]La felicità [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] proveniente dalle risorse di lusso donate aumenta del 50%.[NEWLINE]L'infelicità [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] proveniente dal numero di [ICON_CITIZEN] e dal numero di città è diminuita del 5%.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Filantropia[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Le donazioni in oro [ICON_GOLD] alle città-stato producono +25% [ICON_INFLUENCE] e [ICON_INFLUENCE] delle città-stato diminuisce il 25% più lentamente.

Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Colonizzazione[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Colono[ENDCOLOR] gratis.[NEWLINE]+33% [ICON_PRODUCTION] produzione per i coloni.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CITIZEN] nelle nuove città fondate.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Abbellimento[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]-10% [ICON_GOLD] mantenimento degli edifici.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] produzione per le meraviglie.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] da ogni meraviglia.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Unità dell'impero[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]-33% [ICON_CULTURE] costo delle politiche dovuto al numero delle città ed età dell'oro.

Set.Text: INVASIONI BARBARICHE
Invasioni Barbariche
Invasioni Barbariche è un policy branch che si focalizza sulla difesa e sull'integrazione.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Invasioni Barbariche[ENDCOLOR] si focalizza sulla difesa e sull'integrazione.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare Invasioni fornisce [ICON_CULTURE] ogni uccisione di unità barbare e un bonus del +50% contro le unità barbare.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare tutte le politiche di Invasioni fornisce il 100% [ICON_GOLD] ogni uccisione di unità nemica.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Invasioni Barbariche[ENDCOLOR] si focalizza sulla difesa e sull'integrazione.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare Invasioni fornisce [ICON_CULTURE] ogni uccisione di unità barbare e un bonus del +50% contro le unità barbare.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare tutte le politiche di Invasioni fornisce il 100% [ICON_GOLD] ogni uccisione di unità nemica.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Oligarchia[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Le unità di guarnigione nelle città non hanno costi di mantenimento; inoltre una città dotata di guarnigione guadagna un bonus del 50% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] alla Forza di combattimento a distanza.[NEWLINE]Questa politica sblocca l'unità [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]catapulta[ENDCOLOR].
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Lusso[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Fornisce +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] meraviglie e +1 [ICON_GOLD] ogni 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] della capitale.
Monarchia è una forma di governo incentrata sul re e quindi sulla capitale e sulla difesa del proprio territorio.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Monarchia[ENDCOLOR] si presta ad una civlità che si concentra sulla capitale.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare Monarchia fornisce +3 [ICON_CULTURE] in capitale.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare tutte le politiche di Monarchia fornirà 4 acquedotti e +2 [ICON_FOOD] da acquedotto.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Monarchia[ENDCOLOR] si presta ad una civlità che si concentra sulla capitale.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare Monarchia fornisce +3 [ICON_CULTURE] in capitale.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare tutte le politiche di Monarchia fornirà 4 acquedotti e +2 [ICON_FOOD] da acquedotto.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

Pace ellenica

Set.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Meritocrazia[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]-5% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] da [ICON_CITIZEN] nelle città non occupate e +5% [ICON_PRODUCTION] per gli edifici.

La democrazia è nata in Grecia. Essa è una forma di governo dove il potere è del popolo; per questo, il branch democrazia è incentrato sulla cultura della civiltà ma anche sulla crescita e sulla felicità della civiltà.

La [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Democrazia[ENDCOLOR] si presta ottimamente a una civiltà che punta su cultura ed espansione.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare Democrazia fornisce +1 [ICON_CULTURE] e +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] in ogni città.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare tutte le politiche della Democrazia farà comparire un Grande Personaggio a tua scelta.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.

La [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Democrazia[ENDCOLOR] si presta ottimamente a una civiltà che punta su cultura ed espansione.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare Democrazia fornisce +1 [ICON_CULTURE] e +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] in ogni città.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adottare tutte le politiche della Democrazia farà comparire un Grande Personaggio a tua scelta.[NEWLINE]Inoltre, concludendo il branch, riceverai una politica gratis.
